summary: Adds General Stores functionality to Severin Manor.
descriptionHtml:
GENERAL STORES IS REQUIRED FOR THIS MOD: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18340/]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18340/[/url]
(it is also recommended, although not required, that you install Mansarde's hotfix linked [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/694796-general-stores/page-26#entry7394256]here[/url].)



Severin Manor is a nice little residence on Solstheim, but I've gotten used to the convenience of the General Stores mod. And since nobody else has added support for it to Severin Manor, I decided to fire up the Creation Kit and add those activators in myself. All of the primary activator types have been added, as well as an unburden fountain, master storage chest, and cistern entrance.

As of version 1.2, these activators will not appear until you take ownership of Severin Manor.

I made only one change to the vanilla layout -- a single Bone Meal was moved so as to better position the alchemist's mortar. Aside from that, all the mod contains is the new activators. I cleaned it myself to make sure.
author: LLJKTechnogeek

files.name: General Stores for Severin Manor
files.changelogHtml: Incorporated the fix to the Severin Manor background music from the Unofficial Dragonborn Patch.

files.name: General Stores for Severin Manor
files.changelogHtml: Activators will no longer be present before you actually claim ownership of Severin Manor. (Turns out there was a perfectly functional enable parent in the DLC all along.)

files.name: General Stores for Severin Manor
files.changelogHtml: Changed the book storage activator from stack to bookshelf. Don't worry, it's still in the same area.
